scripts.precheck: npm run jest && npm run mdlint
scripts.cleanbuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.a11ycheck: pa11y-ci public/*.html public/*/*.html public/*/*/*.html public/*/*/*/*.html public/*/*/*/*/*.html || true
scripts.validate: npm run linkcheck && npm run htmlcheck && npm run a11ycheck
scripts.buildtest-local: npm run precheck && npm run cleanbuild && npm run validate
scripts.deploy-uat: npm run deploy-uat-infra && npm run deploy-uat-site
scripts.linkcheck-uat: npx blc --filter-level 3 --get --recursive --exclude /atom.xml --exclude /favicon.png --exclude http://2019-01-28-securing-s3.demo.alphageek.com.au.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com --exclude http://localhost:4000 --exclude http://dev./%3Cyour_domain%3E/ --user-agent '<PASSWORD_DEFINED_IN_SERVERLESS_CONFIGURATION> Tester' http://dev.alphageek.com.au
scripts.test-uat: npm run deploy-uat && npm run linkcheck-uat
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run deploy-prod-infra && npm run deploy-prod-site
scripts.test-prod: npm run deploy-prod && npm run linkcheck-prod
